title: How to Make Quick Taco Quesadillas

steps.headline: Brown the meat until fully done and drain all juices.
Add the seasoning mix to the meat.
Add the seasoned meat to one half of the tortillas.
Layer the avocado slices and cheese on top of the meat.
Use the taco sauce from the box and drizzle on top.
Fold the tortillas and place them on a greased cookie sheet.
Serve warm with a side of mild or hot sauce.

text: Brown the meat until fully done and drain all juices.  Add the seasoning mix to the meat. Follow the dinner box directions. Prepare and soften the tortillas.  Add the seasoned meat to one half of the tortillas.  Layer the avocado slices and cheese on top of the meat.  Use the taco sauce from the box and drizzle on top.  Fold the tortillas and place them on a greased cookie sheet.  Bake for 8 to 10  minutes at 425 °F (218 °C).  Serve warm with a side of mild or hot sauce.  Finished.
